00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Xml;
00025 #endregion
00026 
00027 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.BlogML
00028 {
00032     public class BlogML
00033     {
00034         #region Constructor
00035 
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039         public BlogML(string Location)
00040         {
00041             try
00042             {
00043                 XmlDocument Document = new XmlDocument();
00044                 Document.Load(Location);
00045                 foreach (XmlNode Children in Document.ChildNodes)
00046                 {
00047                     if (Children.Name.Equals("blog", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00048                     {
00049                         foreach (XmlNode Child in Children.ChildNodes)
00050                         {
00051                             if (Child.Name.Equals("title", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00052                             {
00053                                 _Title = Child.InnerText;
00054                             }
00055                             else if (Child.Name.Equals("sub-title", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00056                             {
00057                                 _SubTitle = Child.InnerText;
00058                             }
00059                             else if (Child.Name.Equals("authors", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00060                             {
00061                                 _Authors = new Authors((XmlElement)Child);
00062                             }
00063                             else if (Child.Name.Equals("categories", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00064                             {
00065                                 _Categories = new Categories((XmlElement)Child);
00066                             }
00067                             else if (Child.Name.Equals("posts", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00068                             {
00069                                 _Posts = new Posts((XmlElement)Child);
00070                             }
00071                         }
00072                     }
00073                 }
00074             }
00075             catch { }
00076         }
00077         #endregion
00078 
00079         #region Private Variables
00080         private string _Title = "";
00081         private string _SubTitle = "";
00082         private Authors _Authors=null;
00083         private Categories _Categories = null;
00084         private Posts _Posts = null;
00085         #endregion
00086 
00087         #region Public Properties
00088 
00089 
00090 
00091         public string Title
00092         {
00093             get { return _Title; }
00094             set { _Title = value; }
00095         }
00096 
00100         public string SubTitle
00101         {
00102             get { return _SubTitle; }
00103             set { _SubTitle = value; }
00104         }
00105         
00109         public Authors Authors
00110         {
00111             get { return _Authors; }
00112             set { _Authors = value; }
00113         }
00114 
00118         public Categories Categories
00119         {
00120             get { return _Categories; }
00121             set { _Categories = value; }
00122         }
00123 
00127         public Posts Posts
00128         {
00129             get { return _Posts; }
00130             set { _Posts = value; }
00131         }
00132         #endregion
00133     }
00134 }
